verses.esv:
2   The LORD is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer,
    my God, my rock, in whom I take refuge,
    my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.
verses.kjv: 2 The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.
verses.niv: 2 The LORD is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge. He is my shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.

verses.esv: 18 And I tell you, you are Peter, and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.
verses.kjv: 18 And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.
verses.niv: 18 And I tell you that you are Peter, and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of Hades will not overcome it.

verses.esv:
Of David.

144:1   Blessed be the LORD, my rock,
    who trains my hands for war,
    and my fingers for battle;
verses.kjv: 1 Blessed be the LORD my strength, which teacheth my hands to war, and my fingers to fight:
verses.niv: 1 Praise be to the LORD my Rock, who trains my hands for war, my fingers for battle.

verses.esv:
2   “There is none holy like the LORD:
    for there is none besides you;
    there is no rock like our God.
verses.kjv: 2 There is none holy as the LORD: for there is none beside thee: neither is there any rock like our God.
verses.niv: 2 "There is no one holy like the LORD; there is no one besides you; there is no Rock like our God.

verses.esv: 24 “Everyone then who hears these words of mine and does them will be like a wise man who built his house on the rock. 25 And the rain fell, and the floods came, and the winds blew and beat on that house, but it did not fall, because it had been founded on the rock. 26 And everyone who hears these words of mine and does not do them will be like a foolish man who built his house on the sand. 27 And the rain fell, and the floods came, and the winds blew and beat against that house, and it fell, and great was the fall of it.”
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, which built his house upon a rock: 25 And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not: for it was founded upon a rock. 26 And every one that heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them not, shall be likened unto a foolish man, which built his house upon the sand: 27 And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell: and great was the fall of it.
verses.niv: 24 "Therefore everyone who hears these words of mine and puts them into practice is like a wise man who built his house on the rock. 25 The rain came down, the streams rose, and the winds blew and beat against that house; yet it did not fall, because it had its foundation on the rock. 26 But everyone who hears these words of mine and does not put them into practice is like a foolish man who built his house on sand. 27 The rain came down, the streams rose, and the winds blew and beat against that house, and it fell with a great crash."

verses.esv:
32   “For who is God, but the LORD?
    And who is a rock, except our God?
verses.kjv: 32 For who is God, save the LORD? and who is a rock, save our God?
verses.niv: 32 For who is God besides the LORD? And who is the Rock except our God?

verses.esv: 13 And the ones on the rock are those who, when they hear the word, receive it with joy. But these have no root; they believe for a while, and in time of testing fall away.
verses.kjv: 13 They on the rock are they, which, when they hear, receive the word with joy; and these have no root, which for a while believe, and in time of temptation fall away.
verses.niv: 13 Those on the rock are the ones who receive the word with joy when they hear it, but they have no root. They believe for a while, but in the time of testing they fall away.

verses.esv:
18   You were unmindful of the Rock that bore you,
    and you forgot the God who gave you birth.
verses.kjv: 18 Of the Rock that begat thee thou art unmindful, and hast forgotten God that formed thee.
verses.niv: 18 You deserted the Rock, who fathered you; you forgot the God who gave you birth.

verses.esv:
95:1   Oh come, let us sing to the LORD;
    let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation!
verses.kjv: 1 O come, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.
verses.niv: 1 Come, let us sing for joy to the LORD; let us shout aloud to the Rock of our salvation.

verses.esv: 40 He answered, “I tell you, if these were silent, the very stones would cry out.”
verses.kjv: 40 And he answered and said unto them, I tell you that, if these should hold their peace, the stones would immediately cry out.
verses.niv: 40 "I tell you," he replied, "if they keep quiet, the stones will cry out."

verses.esv:
51:1   “Listen to me, you who pursue righteousness,
    you who seek the LORD:
  look to the rock from which you were hewn,
    and to the quarry from which you were dug.
verses.kjv: 1 Hearken to me, ye that follow after righteousness, ye that seek the LORD: look unto the rock whence ye are hewn, and to the hole of the pit whence ye are digged.
verses.niv: 1 "Listen to me, you who pursue righteousness and who seek the LORD: Look to the rock from which you were cut and to the quarry from which you were hewn;

verses.esv: 4 and all drank the same spiritual drink. For they drank from the spiritual Rock that followed them, and the Rock was Christ.
verses.kjv: 4 And did all drink the same spiritual drink: for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them: and that Rock was Christ.
verses.niv: 4 and drank the same spiritual drink; for they drank from the spiritual rock that accompanied them, and that rock was Christ.

verses.esv:
2   He alone is my rock and my salvation,
    my fortress; I shall not be greatly shaken.
verses.kjv: 2 He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.
verses.niv: 2 He alone is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will never be shaken.

verses.esv:
46   The LORD lives, and blessed be my rock,
    and exalted be the God of my salvation—
verses.kjv: 46 The LORD liveth; and blessed be my rock; and let the God of my salvation be exalted.
verses.niv: 46 The LORD lives! Praise be to my Rock! Exalted be God my Savior!

verses.esv:
4   “The Rock, his work is perfect,
    for all his ways are justice.
  A God of faithfulness and without iniquity,
    just and upright is he.
verses.kjv: 4 He is the Rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are judgment: a God of truth and without iniquity, just and right is he.
verses.niv: 4 He is the Rock, his works are perfect, and all his ways are just. A faithful God who does no wrong, upright and just is he.

verses.esv:
6   He only is my rock and my salvation,
    my fortress; I shall not be shaken.
verses.kjv: 6 He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.
verses.niv: 6 He alone is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will not be shaken.

verses.esv:
10   Enter into the rock
    and hide in the dust
  from before the terror of the LORD,
    and from the splendor of his majesty.
verses.kjv: 10 Enter into the rock, and hide thee in the dust, for fear of the LORD, and for the glory of his majesty.
verses.niv: 10 Go into the rocks, hide in the ground from dread of the LORD and the splendor of his majesty!

verses.esv:
26   He shall cry to me, ‘You are my Father,
    my God, and the Rock of my salvation.’
verses.kjv: 26 He shall cry unto me, Thou art my father, my God, and the rock of my salvation.
verses.niv: 26 He will call out to me, 'You are my Father, my God, the Rock my Savior.'

verses.esv: 11 having the glory of God, its radiance like a most rare jewel, like a jasper, clear as crystal.
verses.kjv: 11 Having the glory of God: and her light was like unto a stone most precious, even like a jasper stone, clear as crystal;
verses.niv: 11 It shone with the glory of God, and its brilliance was like that of a very precious jewel, like a jasper, clear as crystal.

verses.esv:
2   Each will be like a hiding place from the wind,
    a shelter from the storm,
  like streams of water in a dry place,
    like the shade of a great rock in a weary land.
verses.kjv: 2 And a man shall be as an hiding place from the wind, and a covert from the tempest; as rivers of water in a dry place, as the shadow of a great rock in a weary land.
verses.niv: 2 Each man will be like a shelter from the wind and a refuge from the storm, like streams of water in the desert and the shadow of a great rock in a thirsty land.

verses.esv:
31   For who is God, but the LORD?
    And who is a rock, except our God?—
verses.kjv: 31 For who is God save the LORD? or who is a rock save our God?
verses.niv: 31 For who is God besides the LORD? And who is the Rock except our God?

verses.esv: 6 Behold, I will stand before you there on the rock at Horeb, and you shall strike the rock, and water shall come out of it, and the people will drink.” And Moses did so, in the sight of the elders of Israel.
verses.kjv: 6 Behold, I will stand before thee there upon the rock in Horeb; and thou shalt smite the rock, and there shall come water out of it, that the people may drink. And Moses did so in the sight of the elders of Israel.
verses.niv: 6 I will stand there before you by the rock at Horeb. Strike the rock, and water will come out of it for the people to drink." So Moses did this in the sight of the elders of Israel.

verses.esv:
31   For their rock is not as our Rock;
    our enemies are by themselves.
verses.kjv: 31 For their rock is not as our Rock, even our enemies themselves being judges.
verses.niv: 31 For their rock is not like our Rock, as even our enemies concede.

verses.esv: 16 calling to the mountains and rocks, “Fall on us and hide us from the face of him who is seated on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb,
verses.kjv: 16 And said to the mountains and rocks, Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him that sitteth on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb:
verses.niv: 16 They called to the mountains and the rocks, "Fall on us and hide us from the face of him who sits on the throne and from the wrath of the Lamb!

verses.esv:
3   Be to me a rock of refuge,
    to which I may continually come;
  you have given the command to save me,
    for you are my rock and my fortress.
verses.kjv: 3 Be thou my strong habitation, whereunto I may continually resort: thou hast given commandment to save me; for thou art my rock and my fortress.
verses.niv: 3 Be my rock of refuge, to which I can always go; give the command to save me, for you are my rock and my fortress.
